long_description: With the REI Tech-Compatible Grip gloves, you can operate your touch-screen gadgets withouth exposing your fingers to the chill. Tech-compatible patches on the forefingers and thumbs work with touch screens so you can send texts and surf the web without taking the gloves off. Soft, warm polyester/acrylic/wool blend wicks moisture and breathes well. The REI Tech-Compatible Grip gloves have synthetic grippers on the palms.
short_description: With the REI Tech-Compatible Grip gloves, you can operate your touch-screen gadgets withouth exposing your fingers to the chill.
